name: Group Work
description:
How To Play
  • Use the mouse to drag the employees(green) to the room. to gain the points on the right side to get more employees.
  • You can move mouse over the employee to see values(sanity, energy and points for various tasks).
  • The room above is the tasks room.
  • The room below is for relaxation.
  • If the employee runs out of energy it will switch to sanity instead (every time the employee loses sanity gains more points), and if the employee loses all sanity , the game will restart.
